job_description:
Role: Senior Java Developer-GCP

Location: Remote (EST time)

Duration: 12+ Months

Job Description
Design and build solutions on GCP and related technologies including Dataflow, Cloud function, Cloud build, Cloud scheduler, gsutil, BigQuery, Compute Engine, Kubernetes Engine
Expert in java and spring framework to implement rest API and Microservice in GCP
Ensuring continuous professional self-development.
Designing and implementing applications.
Analyzing user requirements to develop application design.
Defining application objectives and functionality.
Aligning application design with business goals.
Must Have
7+ experience in Java and Spring Framework
Cloud - GCP
Big Query
Data Flow
Kubernetes Engine
Compute Engine
Postgress, Mongo DB, Elastic Search DB
